text: Va [sarancom] Bani Isroilro az darjo guzarondem,on goh Fir'avn va sipohijonas az ruji sitam va tacovuz dar paji onon raftand, to hangome ki ƣarqoʙi U [Fir'avn]-ro faro girift, [ʙo noumedi] guft: «Imon ovardam, ki hec ma'ʙude [ʙar haq] nest, magar kase, ki Bani Isroil ʙa U imon ovardaand va man az taslimsudagonam»
